There is a big difference between the east and the west, when comes to education,i always admired how the westerner educate their posterity,their method is so gentle and kind,full of love and meaning,whereas the asian method is rather more of violence,for example the chinese people believe that a child should be educated with rods
countless beating from their parent is believe to be capable of forging a successful child!thats how i was brought up at least, my parent always tell me how much they love me although they served me with rod every time i commit a wrongdoing,however when comes to the western way of parenting,it sounds like a fairy tale to me,for example the western parent always said this to their child if they happened to be repudiate, the parent will say this\" go to your room!\" this is something that will never happen in an asian family
May be our parent would never realize the trauma they had inflicted on us
how successful was the league of nations in establishing peace during the 1920s
The league of nations is an organization form to improve lives and jobs of the people around the world,settle peace by disarmament ,and to uphold and enforce the treaty of Versailles
The league was successful in establishing peace during 1920s through discouraging aggression to other countries by negotiation ,the Lon also plan to provide collective security by a community of power,example silesia,where the league settle a dispute between germany and poland through plebiscite,another example is the aaland where under lon's investigation settle a dispute between sweden and finland,the league is also successful in improving the life of people,for example they provide direct aid and welfare to the people in need around the world,one of the famous act is the repatriation of 400000 ww1 prisoners and employ them to kill mosquitos to prevent malaria and also prevent leprosy,they also provide economic experts to help Austria and Hungary as well as establishing the international labour organization
As three of the most powerful nations in the world do not participate in the lon they are germany
russia and united state,the two most powerful countries in lon britain and france wanted to recover their economic loss in ww1 so they show no enthusiastic to get involve,the league fail to establish disarmament,first in 1923 and second in 1931 both fail because britain and germany,however they did arrange a conference in 1928 the kellog-briand pact which was an act of league assembly sign by 23 nations and supported by 65 countries and which outlawed war
however they are unsuccessful because most of their disarmament  were not achieve
the greatest achievement of the league is the social issue no organization had ever do it before ,until now their war has been taken over by the U
N so it is a great success,however it fail to stop powerful countries starting a war,fail to establish disarmament,also fail to defend the treaty of Versailles ,these give rise to aggression by axis power

China opposes Paris award for Dalai Lama (中国反对巴黎为达赖喇嘛授奖
China on Tuesday condemned the honorary citizen award from Paris for the Dalai Lama, saying it posed \"a grave interference in Sino-French relations
Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman Qin Gang said China was indignant and resolutely opposed Paris's award for the Dalai Lama made despite China's opposition
Such a move stirs strong indignation among the Chinese people,\" Qin said, noting that inevitably, it would severely undermine the cooperation between Paris and Chinese cities, and gravely disturb China-France relations
China held a clear, persistent and firm position over the Tibetissue, which was related to China's core interests and major political concern, he said
Qin urged Paris to stop interfering in China's internal affairs,and immediately correct its wrongdoing
This move by the Paris government gravely damaged the city's image among the Chinese, Qin said
A poll on the website of the Global Times found more than 87 percent of voters firmly opposed the Paris move
Paris should bear all the blame, Qin said, urging Paris to takethe right attitude towards the Chinese people's voice, and stop its offence to the Chinese people, in a bid to create an essentialcondition for the cooperation with Chinese cities
The agenda for the dialogue includes topics ranging from energy conservation and environmental protection, to finance and agriculture
Since it first convened in 2007, the China-Japan high level economic dialogue has proven to be their most important mechanism for discussions on major economic concerns, and important regional and global economic issues
Chinese Commerce Minister Chen Deming said, \"I think we two sides can make joint efforts in following 5 aspects
Chen said, \"China's trade deficit to Japan was 34 and a half billion US dollars

The love and the Japanese language
Japanese, however, hadn't have the proper word which signifies \"love\" because of the sensibilities and lyricism
When one of his students put \"I love you\" into Japanese as ”私はあなたを愛しています\", he warned him against that translation
Japanese should put it into like  \"今夜は月が綺麗ですね\"(which means \"The moon looks more beautiful tonight\") instead
I think what he meant was that \"love\" is the feeling that makes the moon looks brighter than the moon you see by yourself

It's placed in a hour from my house but I had never been there
As you see in the picture, that was really, really beautiful
t I felt like \"the true colors of Japan\" was there
The second picture is the oldest bridge in Nagoya
There are some rules about paying homage at a shrine
2 You have to walk left side of the road because its center is for the kami-sama to walk
Then tap your hands twice , bow and wish your desire in your heart
At this point, you shouldn't speak your wish in voice
These are some of conventions of Shinto
But I saw many people didn't follow them

Today, I went shopping to buy a key holder of　sample of food with my friend
What is “Sample of foods”
It is a fake of meals or foods like this
In Japan,　in front of restaurant’s entrance, there is often Sample of foods
It is very similar to real meals
I have heard that tourists from foreign countries are surprised to see them
And, this price is not cheap, a small key holder ’s price is over 700 yen(about 7 U
It is because, they are handmade
A professional Sample of foods maker makes every of them by their hands
We went to buy it for our native speaker teacher of Urudu
He is leaving from Japan in this winter
So we wanted to give him a thing characteristic of Japan

Trip to Hongkong
In fact my wife comes from Hong Kong
We are visiting her hometown in years
In the beginning, I can enjoy western styles of foods like bread, cheese, and pizza, but after sometime, I started to miss Korean foods so much
However, Korean foods were quite expensive and it is hard to find Korean restaurants
I think a lot of foreign people are facing similar difficulties in Korea if they come from some small countries
They have something like congee, a lot of noodles, and many sea oriented foods
I still remember a course of 12 dishes we had at the banquet in Hong Kong
I started to study English in my first year of the middle school
It was a lot late compared with students these days
As I know, they start to learn English much earlier age even from the pre-school or kindergarten
That may be the reason my conversation skill is not as good as my reading and writing skills
I think any language should be acquired in one's early age at least before 10 years old; otherwise, it would be a difficult task for him to speak the language fluently as native speakers do

The ritual came from the Confucianism
We have grown up reading some Chinese novels like \"Sam-Kuk-Ji\", and \"Seo-U-Ki.\" Even some old people were very proud of saying they read the book series for several times
Some people have thought Chinese have a bigger body than Korean because we are in different ethnic groups
Around 10 years ago, I could have the first chance to meet Chinese, first, people from Taiwan and then main land China

Frankly, I got impression that they were poor and little tiny but I started to enjoy their food especially ones from \"Schezan\" area

library
Public library in my town has mail reserve and delivery service
If I want to read a book, firstly I access the website of library
And I search a book what I want to read in collection of a library
I use the mail reserve and delivery service
The book is delivered at convenience-store near my house by a library
And a library send tracking information to me
And I go to convenience-store and receive a book
After I read a book, I return it to convenience-store
It is very good service

Waiting him is what she hates the most
She looks again the old clock
The silence is surrounding her and she can help trembling while thinks about him
The living-room is cold, so is she
Her voice is a whisper that disappears into the living-room like a dream does when the night is over
She can stand it anymore and turn on the tv and her eyes got fixed on the screen
Breathless, she finally arrives there to find him putting his shoes off and she’s unable to control herself and holds him so tight that he can breathe
Smiling, the boy kisses her head and pulls her away softy “It’s late, you should be sleeping, no waiting for me” he says tenderly “You know I won’t be sleeping until you’ll be here” Narrowing his eyes, the boy walks through the corridor until he realizes the TV is still on
In silence, he crosses the door and his eyes glues on the screen
There, he holds her tight making her smile
“Now you’re here I can sleep”

However, I changed the way of thinking after listening to a speech, which is given by Steve Jobs, who is a founder and a CEO of Apple Computer
It is really impressive and gives me courage to keep 
making efforts even if I face plights
and hardships but he taught me how to handle difficulties
He established Apple Computer when he was young, and enjoyed 
But suddenly, 
Jobs became extremely distressed and lost the will to do anything
He determined to start again and 
struggled to survive, because he liked his job very much
Then, he 
launched a new company named Next and another company named 
Pixar after such a discouraging event
The company he sold has become the foundation and been playing an important role in Apple
He addressed that if he had not been fired, Apple would not have become one of the most successful companies in the world
His story demonstrates that difficulties at the time can be an 
essential link to greater happiness
Positive thinking paves the way 
for making success
Looking back in the past he realized that his 
failures were not so bad and that they are necessary step toward his 
future success
There is no need not to be depressed, because the 
sun always rises again, after all
So, don't you think that it is ridiculous to get discouraged every time a difficulty may occur
Second, do not speak depressing words
If you keep showing optimistic, your optimism grows
Why don’t you take actions, 
success and I make me happy in my future
But if I am pessimistic, I cannot make full use of my experience
So, I want to look forward 
and stay positive in any times

The website defines \"paternalism\" as the following sentences
Moreover, according to “Guide to Cross Cultural Communication” which is written by Sana Reynolds and Deborah Valentine, there are two characteristics in “paternalism”
First, people who have more powerful control less powerful people
Second, people who have the right to control less powerful people must take of them
I have defined “paternalism” up to now
Henceforth, I would like to write about a social issue in Japanese society in which I think “paternalism” is observed
I think “paternalism” is still observed in medicine

But I don't like this system on which the government place many national holidays and make up consecutive holidays
Since everybody have to get off at the same time, almost all of places where people will go, such as any amusement parks, zoos, theaters, the roads people will get there and so on, would be hardly crowded
Although Japanese labor system has the same system of the \"holiday of pay\"　applied to many foreign countries which everybody can take it at will, willingly Japanese workers won't get it supposedly because Japanese has  assiduity　basically and doesn't go for acting alone such as getting a holiday with pay while co-workers works

Are lots of patients having allergy to pollen in your country
I've often heard allergy to pollen, especially of Japanese ceder, has become a national disease of Japanese people nowadays
On this season, by the beginning of spring, pollens of Japanese ceder is starting to fly to almost everywhere in Japan
Major symptoms are a runny nose, sneezing and itchy eyes
They are very rough symptoms
I've also haven allergy to pollen since 10 years ago
Firstly I thought I had caught cold at that day, but after weeks from the finding I realized I had been a allergy to pollen because there aren't such protracted colds
Recently I use antiallergic drugs such as a histamine-antagonizing agent and drops and a nasal drip of steroids
the symptoms can be almost controlled by them
According to a weather forecast of today, it is fine day tomorrow
Usually I can think the fine day is very good and comfortable, but only in this season I might be able to think so
Because pollens are fling anywhere and sometimes the symptoms are appearing by enormous pollens in air

A mind for cherry blossoms in Japanese
I think there must be nobody of Japanese who dislike cherry blossoms
As you can find in pictures above, in this season we have a field party under cherry trees seeing the blossoms opening up on the trees or flying off
We call the party as \"花見 hanami.\" 
One week ago, I also went to a park with my wife and daughter to where it took 30 minutes by car from my home
I was very happy to see just starting the blossoms' to fall off from the branches, as if cherry blossoms are April showers
Especially Japanese people are fascinated by falling cherry blossoms
Medieval Japanese fighter 'Bushi' would have hoped to die with dignity and beauty like falling cherry blossoms during battles
As a matter of course, we haven't thought so, but I think the consideration for the 'cherry blossom' is one of precious inheriting and to inherit cultures in Japanese

Sometimes children get amazingly different meaning from phrases which are spoken by adult people or TV programs
My daughter watch a TV program which is a animation program about vegetable dolls on the morning of every week days
One day pretending the narrator I said \"Have a good night!\" on watching the program
After that, my daughter abruptly said \"おかたづけ!\" As you may know, the word as Japanese means clearing off goods or toys
I didn't know why she spoke so suddenly
But a few days later I had understood the reason
She understood the meaning of \"Have a good night\" as \"Have a nainai (ないない
ないない\" is one of baby words, means cleaning off goods or toys
She could hear wrongly \"good night\" to \"nainai.\" Nowadays every just before cleaning off she said the phrase

All the birthday gifts I have received were few and normal
Maybe, to other people, there were no any special features in those presents
However, I thought whether a present is special or not depends on your own mind rather than other people’s opinion
Contrast to other gifts, it was the most simple and cheapest one, but it was also my favorite one
Different from those pencil boxes we can see in the bookstore, it was not made of textile but plastic
Compared with those colorful and delicate designed stationary is its simple white-black color matching and square shape
My friends usually praise my box for its cute pattern different from those monotonous logos on other pencil boxes
What a delight for me is that everybody likes the pencil box so mush and wants to buy a same one for themselves
Nevertheless, the reason why I like the present so much is not the pattern, the color or the shape, but the benediction contained in the gift
What touched me deeply was that my classmate carved some notes with best wishes in the pencil box for me

Can someone edit this
The Russo-Japanese War started because Japan wanted to halt the spread of the Russian expansion into East Asia
This was what Japan feared the most, because they regarded Korea and Manchuria as a buffer
If an agreement was not made soon, there was going to be a war, and this worried all of Europe because Russia was allied with France and Germany, and Japan had signed a treaty with Great Britain
Europe was worried that the war would spread around the world
It’s not that anyone sought war in both countries, but no matter what happened it’s as if the war was supposed to happen
Though these circumstances only came to be due to the old governments’ policies dating back almost half a century
The following will explain in detail the events of the Russo-Japanese war and how Japan was conceived as an “easy” enemy, but came to be acknowledged as one of the greatest military powers in the world after the apparent victory during the Battle of the Sea of Japan

Salvador was born in 1904 on peninsula in Figueras
Residents sad, that there may born only crazies or genius
Name Salvador he get from his brother, which die previous year
When he was 5 years old — his parents said, that he is reincarnation his brother
tSalvador always was a very strange and always tried to attract attention
He said: «I was able to hold public attention for twenty years
I always made newspapers and peoples said about me whatever, even good»
And he continued draw until die his wife and muse Gala in 1982
After that his works become more and more easy
tBesides painting Salvador make photos, make surrealistic films and even act in advertising
He collaborate with Disney and Hitchcock
t Today Salvador still interesting for people and he considered to be the embodiment of surrealism

How to improve my English composition writing 
Now, I'm preparing for my one year study in America as a international student
I try my best to sharpen all my ability to make progress on my English learning
However, I ecountered a difficulty on my English writing
My teachers said my compostions have weak organization
They said my ideas and thoughts of my compositions are very confused and messy
To be honest, it really was a big impact to me
I have never known there was so many problems about my writing skill
What's more, my writing grade of TOEFL also showed my writing ability is weak
I can't use concrete and clear words to support my ideas and words usage isn't idiomatic
Due to above these reasons, I decieded to try to improve my English writing by writing diaries every day
Also, I would try to write two or three compostions and ask my teachers revise them every week
I'm starting to practice this plan
I hope it could be useful and helpful for me to improve my English writing skill

The first one is the admission
Students who want to use this way have to take the GSAT(General Scholastic Ability Test) in each winter vacation
If it goes smoothly, you can enter college earlier and have 2~3 more months summer vacation
The second one is to take the DRT(Department Required Test) in each beginning of summer vacation
Moreover, the DRT always puts focus on the most difficult parts of the courses, so most of the students rather give up courses of 3rd grade than take the DRT
They only have to fill the departments they want to enter in the form on the website of UAC, and wait for the result according to their grades
In other words, the grades make the decision
I think that the first way is better because it make schools and parents help students to find their target of life earlier
High school students in Taiwan must arrive school at 7:30 every day, and stay in school for 9 hours until 17:00
The admission will improve students' motivation of learning, and it may convince parents to give their children more free time

It suggest via a picture that China has the dirtiest air condition full of tiny particles all around the country
The atmosphere here is even denser than that in Sahara Desert
It is said the particles, the diameter of which is small to a certain extent, can be easily inhaled to the finest part of our lungs, called \"Alveolus\", then may trigger some serious disease like cancer
This pic was taken just now（5:30pm） at my balcony 10-storey high，Guangzhou City
The len is towards west, supposing to capture some sunset scenery but totally vague here and the sun was just missing
One may think it is froggy but truely it is not the case as the weather is extremly muggy at the moment that you feel not that easy without an air-conditioner, with a temperature up to 30c and humidity up to 80
Actually, this weather condition is called haze, a common weather situation for Guangzhou these years

10th entry: \"In your opinion, why people raise money for charity? Have you ever done anything to raise money for charity
There are plenty of reasons raising money for charity
The most important reason is sharing luck to the Poor
As you know, Our social is developing rapidly, thus the living cost also increase quickly
As the result, the poor people are very hard to survive
People ready to give a hand to the poor who really needs our helps
Some people have a strong believe that, if we help someone right now, we will get more in the future
This belief has proved for many years
It is the truth, when we give charity to help the poor, we feels happy ourself
I also do charity whenever I have chance
Actually we have a charity fund in our company, each staff will become a member for contributing this fund
we always help the poor, especially children who have no chance to study
We help them by providing a the necessaries things like cloths, food and books as well
In my opinion, do charity is not always by giving money to the poor
As student we can do a thing such as spend time to the poor, working at charity organization
This is the fair life

Unknown things about the body
 In a whole life, heart beats 3 billion times and pumps 48 million gallon blood
 Brain contains about 100 billion neurons
 We was form with 300 set of bones, when we was mature there was only 206 bones
 Each second passes, there are 15 million blood cell destroying in the body

International friendship football game　サッカーの国際親善試合
International friendship football game of Japan vs Korea was held at Seoul yesterday
At first half, Japanese attacked aggressively with short pass but Korean defended with their tough physical
In contrast with first half, Korean possessed the ball most of all time at latter half and there were the conclusive situations to goal but Japanese defender kept no goal at the end
Though it was a friendship match, both of teams did very excited game
Since next world cup will held at Brasil in 2014, I hope both of teams improve their technique and tactics till then and can get a game beyond the final 16 which was result of this year's world cup game

The day before yesterday, we the lab member held the Imoni party
Imoni party is a kind of the BBQ making the pot filled with aroid, Chinese cabbage, green onion, carrot, meat, and so on and mainly organized in Tohoku region which is located in northern part of Japan
In autumn, a lot of smoke of the Imoni party can be seen every near river in Tohoku
In my living town Sendai, the pot is dressed with miso and use pork
The taste is like tonjiru which is one of the gorgeous miso soup with full of vegetables
In the neighbor prefecture Yamagata, they use the soy souse as the main dressing material and use beef
Sweetly and salty taste evoke the Sukiyaki
Since next year I am going to go to the Kanto region, this time Imoni party might be the last time for me
Imoni party was very enjoyable but that idea made me a little bit concern
The picture was shot few years ago

I am going to write about Japanese university life mainly
In Japan, there are tons of news mentioned recent difficulties for university students to hunt  job
Unfortunately, the rate of student who could get work till October in this fiscal year goes down to 58% from 63% of last year
And there are a lot of controversies about what is the main problem
There are a lot of work especially middle and small companies
They only apply big famous companies
If students learned their limitations well, they could get work
Other insist, \"There are too many students than ever
The amount of university students has been increasing, it's double compare to 1990
Now, degree of undergraduate is less special than used to be
Most of their opinions are hard for students
So, the students who are exhausted or getting angry for the job hunting took demonstration
University isn't preparation facility for hunting job
Japan is in the depression right now

It has past several weeks that I had post last diary
During a recent few weeks, I had been practicing for the Ekiden meet organized by electrical faculty of the graduate university
First, I will try to explain about Ekiden simply
But the big difference between full marathon and Ekiden is running alone or not
In Ekiden, runner equips a Tasuki which is like a towel bonding its edges as a baton
To express the appearance of the Tasuki is very difficult :p
Each runner runs own course and gives the Tasuki to the next runner
So we had the Ekiden meet at last Saturday
2 years ago, we could get 5th prise and last year was 4th prise
Since we had good freshman and practice, we could get 3th prise
So, we could have the most enjoyable time in the Oden party after the Ekiden for recent 3years
I hope junior colleagues would get the more good result in next year

Japan has 4 seasons
Those are spring, summer, autumn, and winter
Generally autumn means three month of the year, from September to November
So, It is autumn at moment
In autumn, it is increase that delicasies of seson
And people will be quiet down because the hottest summer had passed
People enjoy to eat something, to feel art
So, Japanese often say \"appetite of autumn\" or \"art of autumn

So I used to play with my friends every day

The mandarin is the language that many kinds of north nomads or minority nationality enter or invaded the Central Plains had been belonging to Han nationally in ancient Chinese, then imitate and try to speak to the ancient han nationality, then learning not too good, so became the so called mandarin
So I think that those place with dialect of south of the Yangtze River is more like or close the sound of ancient Han nationality especially cantonese and inland Min dialects almost as the ancient han nationality
Those explains Why Cantonese literature is so rich and diverse while Mandarin literature in China so poor and shallow

The Chinese animal year resembling constellation in the west
The chinese people like to own the animal's character is his character
Chinese today are tend to contrast animal character with animal year belong to themselves

Yesterday was the day

Q: what advice would  you  give to some one who wants to lose weight
According to an  korean article, 40 percentage of overweight people are  in the world and the number is  increase rapidly
some peole say that, obesity  cause not only   diseases but also lose  self -confident
so,  what sould peole do to reduce a weight 
To begin with, the  most important   thing  is to make a plane for diet
As you know, obesty people prefer high calories foods such as hot-dog, pizza, chocolate
They have to limit for  eating those  food  to avoid fat 
when they buy foods 
After then, make a list a  diet card and put it  on a fridge
They can check daily intake of  foods
It is  essential to pretect  gluttony
Second, they need to  exercise regulary
the expert say that only  law calorie food is   not  enough to  lose  weight
Exercise and  diet food sould go hand   in hand 
However, some of fatness people avoid physical exercise because, they get diseases alredy  such as   hypertension and  rheumatism 
Also  most of them just  keep away  exercise steadily
Taking a exercise should   encourage to take off  fat and for  stimulattion blood circulation 
Third,  attending a group meeting  is a  good way to mindcontrol 
they can share variety of  imformation  with  different experience
Morever,  if  they  know  who  succed  in   diet    it  will be a  good role model for  them
In conclusion,  and i mentioned, im strongly suggest  to overweight poeple who want to   live for  health life
They will spend  tough time to make a goal  
however ,  if   you  control  your minds  and  body condition, you will be successful

Do you think Japanese government should accept more immigrants
I agree with the statement that Japanese should accept more immigrants from abroad to solve problems of declining birthrate and aging population
A number of immigrants want jobs in Japan and they work hard because they want to make change
However in other ways, for example, raising taxes would end up to force people live less happily
I don't want to work after I get 65 yeas old because of lack of the savings and decreased pension
On the contrary, what is the problem of accepting more immigrants
These problems are not big deal
We will be able to solve them by discussing and understanding of cultural differences of each other
All in all, immigrants are powerful solution for aging society
Japanese government should change the policy
Talking with foreigners is much fun
Why don't we live together and make wonderful life with cultural exchange

It is a bad manner to chew gums loudly with a mouth open
They come to the office, sit at their desk, open a bottle of chewing gums, and begin loudly chewing almost every morning
The loud noise bothers me and hinders to concentrate on my work
I don't want to argue them on such a silly slight trivial thing, so I push earplugs into my ear canals everyday
I can concentrate on my job and improve in efficiency more than expected with wearing the earplugs
Why don't you try it, if you want to concentrate on anything

We have the Hydrangea Festival in the town next to my city on last weekend and this weekend
Hydrangea is very popular in Japan
It blooms in June and is the symbol of the rainy season
Red, blue, purple, pink, white, many various colored flowers are very cute and beautiful with its vigorous green leaves especially in the rain
Its flowers is said to vary its colors by the pH of the soil
At the festival, we have some ceremonies, concert, and the other events as well as free appreciation of  hydrangeas planted along the street and footpaths between rice fields
At first, cutting its branches, arranging about 10cm length, cutting the edge sharply, and sticking them into soil in small pot, and then watering enough not to dry up for some weeks
Some of the branches took root successfully and grows in the pots
Winter returned here
Take good care not to get cold, everyone
By the way, do you know of \"Nagori-yuki
Yuki\" means snow, \"Nagori\" means like lingering farewell, I think
Nagori-yuki\" is a kind of snowfall in spring
It sometimes snows in March around Tokyo, or also in southern part of Japan
In March, spring has already come, and no snow are there usually
In spring, we start a new life, like entering schools, getting new jobs, therefore we may have to move to new places
We may have to leave someone then
There might be a sentimental scenes here and there
We are reluctant to leave them at a station platform or somewhere
Just at the moment, it starts snowing sentimentally even dramatically
We call the snow \"Nagori-yuki
So it doesn't mean just snow in spring
Some sentimental meaning is included in \"Nagori-yuki
Nagori- yuki\" is the name of a popular song originally, I'm sorry I'm not sure
My own \"Nagori-yuki\" was
at a long long time ago
I had left my girlfriend at a station platform of my hometown and came to Tokyo about quarter century ago
Anyway, it is one of my precious memories, hahaha
Is it unconscious or conscious
Yes, I did it rather consciously
I have to make it a habit to wake up early absolutely

How to manage to change sports outfits into office clothes
I run to work and back home almost everyday
It is a great way to start a new day and finish work of the day
I can change my mind by running from the working mode to the private mode and vice versa
I introduce you how I manage to change my sports outfits into my office clothes
I can't work at office in my dirty wet sport outfits, it's weird, you know
Luckily, there is a locker for me at a locker room in my office building
I change my sport outfits to my office uniforms there
I bring some extra sport outfits like shirts and shorts and underwear with me in my backpack every morning, and keep them in my locker
So I can run back home in clean dry outfits
I also have to change my sweaty underwear to clean one some times in a day in warm season
And after finishing my work in the office uniforms, I run back home while bringing the dirty wet outfits and underwear back home everyday in my backpack

Gave the lawn a fertilizer
I gave the lawn a fertilizer this morning
First, about 10 gram powder of urea fertilizer, which is two or three scoops by a tablespoon, was solved and diluted to 5 litters of water in a watering pot
And the dilute solution of the fertilizer was given to the lawn, 2 to 3 litters per a square meters
This urea fertilizer is very efficient for the growth of the grass, especially good for greening the leaves
The lawn in my garden turned yellow by the severe heat in this summer
So I'd like to make them recover and want to green them again
I wish the fertilizer help them recover

We place a stack of round rice cakes at every house or family to offer to the deities which come on New Years' days
The stack of rice cakes is called 'Kagami-mochi', which consists of three parts, that is a bigger round cake, a smaller one which is stacked on the bigger one, a orange which is stacked on the smaller one
The New Years's days come to end with some ceremonies including this 'Kagami-biraki' and 'Dondo-yaki', as introduced before, in Japan

At the dinner on the night before his entrance examination, she gave him a piece of her pork cutlets
She like cutlets, so we asked her \"Are you full enough?\" She smiled and said \"This is the \"CUTLET\", eh
She wish his success in his exam, so she gave it to him
The sound of \"cutlet\" and \"Katsu\" which means \"win\" are similar, so the Japanese poor joke, \"Ton-katsu tabete uma-katta\", is very popular
That really means \"I ate pork cutlets
It was delicious.\", but also jokingly means \"A horse ate pork cutlets and won.\" \"Uma\" means horse

In the summer, we have a lot of fireworks festivals in Japan
We Japanese love to go out for watching them in Yukatas, which are the traditional summer clothes of Japan
Yukatas are one kind of Kimonos
Women and girls go out with wearing Yukata in summer, nowadays, for example, to go summer festivals or something like that
Men and boys rarely go out in Yukata
Where we men wear the Yuaktas mostly are probably at Japanese style inns, after taking hot spring
So we can luckily enjoy watching just outside our house, we don't need to take trains or something
The only thing we are sorry about is we can't enjoy Yukatas, because neighbors and we don't wear Yukatas around our houses to watch fireworks

If you want to make a mutual communication with someone, you can start by saying hello with warm smile to them at first

That is a coined word made by adding \"nomi\" to \"communication

In these days they say that we Japanese make less communications with others, especially with colleagues or business partners, than used to before

In these days, I have been repairing the lawn in the garden
It was a kind of cooler climate lawn for autumn and winter season
I have been repairing with another kind of hotter climate lawn for summer season
It grows very faster in this hot summer
I tell you how I repair the lawn
Well, now I get it started
First, cut the straws from the summer kind lawn grass for about 5cm, and second, put them in holes picked in the garden
And then, water the straws every afternoon
Several days later, almost all the picked straw will root and grow

It is a kind of fire festivals to worship traveler's guardian deities which called as 'Doso-jin
It is held here and there in rural area in Japan on the little New Year (January 15th or during14th and 16th by the lunar calendar
We burn the ”Kadomatsu”, that is decorative pine branches, \"Shimekazari\", that is sacred Shinto rope with festoons, \"Kakizome\", that is calligraphies for the New Year, and so on, at the central fire
It is said that we can avoid getting diseases if we eat rice cakes which baked in the fire, and we can improve calligraphy skill if the fire rise high

I don't think it is good to write same corrections as former's, so I am sorry but I can not make corrections adding to them

Have you ever feel these difficulties like me
That is based on the novel originally written by Kanae Minato
It's a revenge story of one junior high school teacher whose daughter was killed his pupils
The story mainly consists of the confessions of some characters
She, who is a teacher, a mother and became a revenger, revenges on the killers for her daughter in the very psychologically terrible way
It was a horrible story, not a happy story
No one could become happy, even the revenger mother and the revenged killers

I don't recommend the movie to all people, especially to parents who have school kids

I hope like this story will not happen in real world

Note everything down on notebooks
We always think of many things of various kinds
Coming up with good ideas, having a brainstorm alone, thinking of a right words or phrases, and so on
And, it's a pity that we can not keep all of them in our mind or we can not remember what good ideas we think up a just while ago
We would forget most things because our brains don't have infinite capacities
Yes, probably it is for us, at least for me certainly
Don't you think it is good if we could remember every good ideas we had thought of
What should we do for that
What we should do for that is to note everything down on notebooks
Bringing notebook with us anytime anywhere, we note down anything you see, hear, feel, and good ideas, even not good ideas, everything
Fortunately, notebooks are not so expensive, easy to get at stationary shops, convenience stores, and so on
And they have infinite capacities if we want
When we fill up a notebook, we can just use the next new one
We can write everything on them and then we can forget everything we had note down
That is a good idea, don't you think so
It is not easy to keep high concentration during the long time

Now open the sweetfish season
They come all the way from a distance early in the morning
The river is famous for sweetfish fishing
They fish by decoy in the center of the river at waist level of water with very long fishing rods
They are lead to invade the turf of some other sweetfish of target and the invaded one attack the decoy to be hooked
That is the way of fishing sweetfish by decoy as well as I know
I have never fished sweetfish by decoy
Many fishers and very long rods in the river is a beautiful scenery in summer

Suspicious no-goal
That happened yesterday at the game between Germany and England
The ball shot by a attacking player hit the crossbar and bounced into the goal once and bounced back outside to the goal keeper
However, the referee didn't recognize the goal by mistake
Referees of the world level seldom make a mistake, but not never unfortunately
That's why many things are interesting and exciting
At the same card in 1966, that was interesting, German verses England, on the contrary, the referee misjudged the goal for actual no goal
This has been called \"Suspicious goal
The play with no goal at yesterday's game will be called \"Suspicious no-goal\", from now on,  I think

Do you know of the \"White Day
Have you heard it
On Valentine's Day, females give chocolates to males as a symbol of there  love or appreciation
And I think it is weird that turned to be obligation these days
Honmei-choco\" means chocolate of love
Giri-choco\" means obligation chocolates
On the \"White Day\", males who luckily received chocolates return their favor by giving gifts, sweets like cookies, candies, etc
even if he received \"Honmei-choco\" or \"Giri-choco
I'm not sure, but there wasn't the White Day in my childhood
We Japanese love interesting events or ceremonies like this, so the White Day got popular immediately
Me
I have received many chocolates from many females, of course, rrom my wife, daughter, many female friends, coworkers
I have to give them very much delicious sweets with my love
Since Vatentine's Day was on Sunday and due to recent slow economy, females doesn't buy less obligation chocolates

Have you ever heard \"Mara-nic
It is made of these two words, \"marathon\" and \"picnic
It means, as you suppose, a picnic of 42.195km marathon distance run
Even slower than normal jog, 7-8min a kilometer or more, I'm not sure
We each take a backpack or a waist bag to carry a bottled water, a camera, a towel, some chocolates, candies, energy gels, and so on, as same as regular picnics

The import tax of leather shoes is very expensive in Japan
It said that $35 for the item, $40 for the shipping, and $50 for the import tax and something, approximately
Don't you think the import tax is too expensive
The import tax of leather shoes is the higher one between $50 or 30% of the price of item including the shipping
This make me think it is better to buy shoes at $100 in Japan than to buy at the reasonable price like this on eBay

We love Sakura, cherry blossoms
It blooms in Spring for only about one week or so
When blooming, the cherry trees doesn't have their leaves, but only many little flowers with cute white pink five petals
We enjoy seeing sakura, Hanami
The Washington's cherry trees are popular, aren't they
After full blooming, cherry blossom petals will fall in the wind
In a moderate wind, they fly into the air one after one lightly (fleetingly?), I think it is a scene of Japanese Wabi-Sabi
In a strong wind, the many petals falls simultaneously
Thousands or millions of petals fly into the air all together
It is so gorgeous that you would forget to breath

There had been a very big earthquake in Kobe, Japan on Jan.17th, 1995
It was today in 15 years ago
It is called \"The Great Hanshin earthquake\" or \"Hanshin-Awaji Dai Shinsai\" in Japan
The magnitude was M7.3

By the way, I am surprised to see that chocolate bars which I keep in my desk for snack are a bit soften and sticky these days
They are not good while being sticky, aren't they
They lose crunchy and crispy taste
They stick to our fingers and then transfer to documents, desk, clothings, or whatever we touch with dirty fingers in summer time
It might be a disaster to stain important documents with chocolates
Or it may make stains on our white shirts
That would probably be a serious matter
That is why I keep coated chocolate balls or something for my snack instead of chocolate bars in summer days
Pay good attention to your chocolates in summer, everyone

Sunscreen attacked my eyes
My eyes hurt as posted yesterday
I wondered if that was really a case that a sunburn caused this inflammation as I posted
That's because I was used to spent more time under sun than yesterday without eye trouble like this
Well then, what caused this inflammation of my eyes, I wonder
I put on some sunscreen on my face before getting out
And after getting out, I sweated a lot like a river and got sweat in my eyes
The sunscreen flew into my eyes with this sweat
It hurted my eyes
That's why my eyes became red and inflamed, I guess
The sunscreen attacked my eyes, I'm sure
I rarely put on sunscreen before now
I didn't know how it hurts my eyes
Well, I learned
I am not going to put sunscreen above my eyes

The sun rises about 4:30 and sets about 19:00 around the summer solstice day
How long that daytime is

When someone give us something, we say \"Sumimasen
When someone help us doing something, we also say \"Sumimasen
Sumimasen\" may usually be translated to \"I am sorry.\" or \"Excuse me.\" In these cases \"Sumimasen\" doesn't mean simple apology but means thanks
I don't know why actually it is, but I think we Japanese think it is a virtue to be modest during our long history, we are said to be modest and the modesty might have made us say \"Sumimasen\" to express thanks
When someone correct my poor English, I will possibly say \"Sumimasen\" as well as \"Arigatou

We discussed some problems of our researches and made consensus what to do and how to do the tasks respectively
The four meetings took about two hours each and total took eight hours
I want to have more time and wish we could do more efficient meeting

It was the highest in September ever recorded in Japan
However, we feel cooler and comfortable breeze blowing these days in the morning and the evening these days
Fall is coming day by day even if very slowly
We are really hope fall will come soon

Do you know a relay marathon race
Have you ever participated in that
At the year-end party after the last run in 2009 on Dec.26th, my friends and I chatted to each other with some alcohol about plans of running  in the next year respectively
One of my friends has taken part in some 100km races before, and another has not yet
They are interested in it, but 100km is too long for unexperienced guys, they said
The experienced friend suggested that we all should participate in a relay marathon together in one team
In a relay race, each runner can run appropriate distance and time according to his ability
Some 24h relay marathons were held in Japan
Our two picks among them will be held in July or in September
How long distance can we run for 24hours, do you think
We must do more long distance and long time training without enough sleep for the straight 24h race
We need some more participants, too
How many participants do you think are needed for a 24h relay race
We think 8 is minimum, and 12 is better
Do you think we are weird, run-holic guys

Such as my hair cut, mow grass, wash cars, jog, and more

It sounds very difficult, isn't it
Yes, it is very difficult to answer to the problem
We have been holding some of this meetings during one year to make out our own answer for that
Well, after the meeting, I took a subway and a private railway go back home
The evening trains in Tokyo area are always very crowded
My train was fully loaded with people who were going back home from work or from school
I mostly had to stand on one foot for some time
I could not put my another foot on the floor
After more than one and half hour struggling in the train, I could finally sit on the seat

We have more four hours until starting the race and I will leave home in an hour
I hope this rain stop or ease off until the start

I heard the news in the train to the starting site

My daughter has a fever since the day before yesterday
She seldom catch a cold and has kept a perfect attendance since the entrance to the elementary school eight years ago
So, she seems to feel sorry for herself very much
Yesterday, she was taken to a doctor and checked if she get a flu
The test result was negative and it said she caught a ordinal cold
We are relieved then
But in the evening, her temperature raised over 38 degrees Celsius again
Many of her classmates are absent from school because of flu yesterday
We are still thinking she have a flue
She is going to be checked again and given appropriate medicines today
I ran into my old friend on the way just before getting home yesterday
It was fancy to see her again there
She said her family had recently moved to our neighborhood
We had lived next to each other in an apartment more than 15 years ago
She has a son of a same age as my son
They used to play together almost everyday when they were toddlers
After my family had moved out, her son and my son played soccer at each teams and played some matches sometimes when they were elementary school boys
After a long interval, not keeping in touch, we happened to meet by accident
We made a promise to meet again with both families and said goodbye
I felt glad to have seen her and heard her family going well
The quarrel between my wife and my daughter seemed finished
A peace came back to my home

Medaka is Japanese rice fish
It is very popular in Japan, we love it very much
The youtube video shows you \"Medaka no gakkou\"; \"School of Japanese rice fish\", that is very popular traditional children's song
I'm afraid that wild medakas are very rare because they are in danger of extinction unfortunately

Many small makes a great
Everything is made of an aggregation of single small steps
Even to climb a big mountain, we should take each step at a time
We have a Japanese proverb like this, \"Chiri mo tsumoreba yama ni naru\", that means \"Many dust makes a big mountain
On the other hand, In English proverb, \"Many small makes a great\", \"Many drops make a shower\", and \"Many sands will sink a ship

I had sudden fever and pain in joints of whole body just like flu
I left work early, took OTC cold medicine, and go to bed to take a rest
I was suffering from the high fever and pain in whole body on the bed
Unfortunately, however, that was in vain
I felt terrible even when sitting on a chair caused by the fever then
I went to see a doctor
I was checked my nose mucosa and urine
My this disease was said an infection of hemolytic streptococcus
I was prescribed an antibiotic, adding to cold medicine, anti fever medicine, and stomach medicine
Joint pains was also relieved gradually

My wife and I went to a short trip to Hakone yesterday
It was my first time to take the train
The train climbs the very steep incline of Hakone mountain by the switching back way
There are some volcanic hot water springs and steams with sulfur smell
The black egg is famous, which is boiled in the volcanic hot spring and the shell is turned black caused by sulfur and iron compounds in it
They say we can live seven years longer by eating every one egg
We ate two eggs respectively, so we will be able to live 14 years longer and we can enjoy the extended lifetime
On the way back home, we enjoyed riding the older, cute retro style railroad cars, which has no air conditioners
we opened the windows and enjoyed the cooler air in the highland
We will go again in another season

Why did the accident happen
There was a traffic accident on the road next the play ground while we were playing soccer
A truck suddenly ran into a fence of the ground
It ran over the sidewalk and ran into the chain-link fence at slow speed
The truck didn't so much collapsed, and another cars and people didn't get involved luckily
It was very luckily
We called a police and an ambulance
There came policemen, an ambulance
And also an fire-engine came there without knowing why, no fire was there

We have planned blackouts for saving electricity
The blackouts will be planned to shut the electricity for three and half hours in Kanto, Tohoku and Chubu districts which divided into five areas in order
My area is the 4th area
This electric power cut will be continued for long time

Have you ever heard it
Dan\" means deny, \"Sha\" means throw away, \"Ri\" means separate
We can get a simple life by denying, throwing away and separating from any bothering things around us
I have a lot of such things rarely used or almost wastes
I am sure you know my feeling
There is a common saying that \"疾風に勁草を知る\" in Japan
It has same meaning as an English proverb: In a calm sea every man is a pilot
The saying is translated to \"We can know which plant is a really strong one only in strong wind
We can know who is really tough only in tough situations
Adding to that, sometimes we may get into a difficult and tough situation of anything, we should think it is a good chance for improving ourselves
I'm sorry if it sounds too much didactic
I just happened to remember this saying while running in the headwind

So we will not have power cuts for a wile at least in this April

We have \"No overtime work day\" of our company on every Sunday
We must leave office before 5:25
It doesn't matter if we finished today's work or not, we must wrap them up and leave
We Japanese are so diligent, even containing somewhat ironic meaning, that we have a tendency to work too much
Someone might happen to lose his health
To say the truth, we may feel relief while working on everyday's stuffs, and may feel somewhat anxious while we have some free hours in the evening on a weekday
We don't have any idea what to do and how to spend it
Working overtime has been like a routine
About one year passed since the No overtime day began, we are now enjoying our after-fives in each ways

We are really nothing in the universe Part1
I didn't really know what to write about for my first Journal, so i decided to pick the first subject that came to my mind
Sometime  when I watch the sky during my daily walk to University I get this strange  feeling inside of me, it's like I'm getting sick of something
I don't really know how to describe the feeling, but it starts when I think about what lies beyond our solary system and how tiny we are
When I was a kid I always had an astronomy book in my hand, looking at picture of the Giant Jupiter, Saturn and all of her halos and learning about how universe in general without understanding the whole proportion and concept behind it
But since I saw the Ultra Deep Field, taked by the Hubble telescope, my vision of the universe totaly changed
The number of galaxies was so huge that I couldn't compare it to anything I knew
I'm going to post this journal in multiple parts, because I'm worried that it's going to be too long to correct

All of us choose to believe someone who we are near by and we share our secret to them, for the expression of our unbearable emotion
However, I choose to believe someone that I don't know
Someone who I'd ever seen, isn't very close to me
Since they are extremely close to me, I can't express all of my feelings and painful with them
I also can't share my secret to them, even through I want to say it loud
Whenever I'm facing them, I have to bear my desire of telling my secret
And my unbelievible feelings appear
In my mind, I'm pretty sure they'll tell the other after I tell my secret to them
It's so easy to imagine that they'll tell all the things to the classmates and thier friends, although I don't want anyone know it
So, I won't have any private in a short run
Base on the above reasons, someone that I have ever seen before and they're not very close to me is much better to believe
Since they're not know me, they're not study at school with me, I can express most of my feelings to them
I have no need to afraid that they'll tell the other because even if they do so, I won't be laughed by my classmates, friends for instance
Meanwhile, I can keep my own private
However, to be honest, I haven't believed someone completely
But we have to say, it's much better for you to express yourself to someone instead of friends, parents
etc, even if they're not faithful with you
PS: \"Someone is always better to believe

The recipi of Japanese dish
Today, I talk about one of my favorite Japanese dishes
I have many favorote Japanese dishes
Although it it is difficult for me to choose only 1 recipe, I think this is a good one to bring to potluck party
Beef & Begetable Rolls
Salt & Pepper ( a little
Splead oil on the cooking sheet of oven plate
Bake for 20 minutes, occationally put soysause mixed mirin on 
and the taste comes into rolls very well
Serve them with tomatoes,lettuce or sliced cabbage
I hope you know or imagine this dish
It makes me happy to go out easily

Let me introduce \"What is a Japanese school rule for my school days?\" for next my diary
Hi everyone, I am really appreciate it you read my diary and your help
As you know we have a school uniform in Japan and also usually wear a T-shirt or a camisole under the uniform
But I had to be white color
It was not accept another color
Also we had a school shoes, everyone had to wearing exact shoes with a specified shocks
Which was must be all white color or one or two borderlines with white color
They checked out all of student every month…
Why did we have to be wear same things, have to be same hair style
But first I visited Paris myself for 2nights…to travel along was my first experience, feel was so lonely
It was not too bad more then I though, but always had to have foods along, did not able to share how much there are beautiful
After that, my friends joined my trip, it made me more fun
Have you been to travel your self
Did Japanese strict school rules made me a person with a half brain
I believe that I was learned how much important to have rules and follow a line to spend in many people with comfortable
After 16 years later, I could understand it…
Looking back, it is coming in useful for my common sense
However around time, I could not understand it
I wished if I were an American girl and I definitely wear in style cloths to school with stylish hair
From that time, it was started to have an interesting about America more than when I was young

Today I will write some Japanese school rules when I was junior high school
It still make me a laughing at the memories.(LOL
Boys:clean-shaven head with maximum 7-8mm
I totally forgot exact number of length, but I am sure it was under 1cm
Girls:If you have a bangs, the length should be above the eyebrows
Also the length is your hair should be above your shoulders
Of course whatever you are boy or girl cannot have a hair color\/perm
Especially I had a long hair since I had a permission

thank you in advance, Mami
This cuisine is very popular in Japan, especially in Kansai region
The name is derived from the word \"Okonomi,\" meaning \"As-you-like-it\", and \"Yaki\" meaning \"grilled
The name originated from \"As-you-like-it\", basically meaning that we can mix in whatever we like
At first, we need to prepare the flour, water, oil, an egg, and shredded cabbage
To be frank, any kind of Okonomiyaki can be made using only these ingredients
However, as you may have imagined, using only these five things does not make Okonomiyaki tasty
We must add some other of our favorite ingredients
We can add whatever we want, corn, cheese, or sausage, etc 
But traditionally, we add bacon, which is cut into about 8cm pieces, green onions, which should be thinly sliced diagonally, Tenkasu which is Tempura bits, and Beni Shoga, which is pickled ginger
Secondly, in a large bowl, we whisk flour and water together until it becomes smooth
Then, we add other things and mix them all together, be sure not to over mix to insure you won’t get tired
Thirdly, pour oil over a griddle that has been heated to 200 degrees and put the Okonomiyaki mixture on it, as if making a pancake, until the mixture is around 1.5cm thick and approximately 30cm across
Then we add the bacon pieces to cover the top of the pancake
Please don't forget that you have to eat quickly or else someone near you will take your portion
「ちきゅうに明日かえる」chikyu ni ERTHkaeru\/（We'll head back to Earth tomorrow）
「りすに救われる」risu ni SWUIRRELeru\/（The squirrel comes to the rescue

indigo dyeing, Aizome dyeing
I want you to enjoy a Japanese indigo dyeing, Aisome dyeing
water-sensitibe dye using onions, so this time, 
we will try Japanese Aizome dyeing which is an indigo dyeing
we will use today, is the one students here planted seeds and grew 
Let me explain how to make it breafly
2) We'll make patters with rubber bands
up with a rubber like this.(showing the cloth)  
The place you tie it up with a rubber band will remain as a white 
If you tie it tighter, it ramains whiter
3) After everybody in your group finish, put it into the pot next to 
4) After soaking, take out it and expose it to the sun
We have to continue this process 2 or 3 times and 
rinse it until water runs clear
Maybe we won't have enough time to finish it,so let's do it

The red ribbon is an international symbol of AIDS awareness that is worn by people all year round and particularly around World AIDS Day to demonstrate care and concern about HIV and AIDS, and to remind others of the need for their support and commitment
The red ribbon started as a \"grass roots\" effort; as a result there is no one official AIDS ribbon manufacturer, and many people make their own

After all, meeting strangers means seeing the unknows
And it's human nature to feel a bit uncomfortable about the unknow
Most of our fears about dealing with new people come from doubts about ourselvse
We imagine other people are judging us too tall or too short, too this or to that
But don't forget that they must be feeling the same way
Try to accept yourself as you are, and try to put the other person at ease
You'll both feel comfortable
Try to act self-confidently even as you don't feel that way when you enter a room full of strangers, such as a new classroom, walk tall and straight, look directly at other people and smile
Don't wait for other person to start a conversation
Friendship is based on mutual liking and \"give and take
And there are things that keep a new friendship from growing

Huamn capital has high rate of return and affects the economy in spite of the obvious imblance between human capital and physical capital China
And it also improves the adaptabitity and allocative efficiency and other relevent benefits
However, due to the low support for education, one's birth place and hukou policy,under-investment and insufficient geographical distribution of human investment,acess to education is not equal
As a result,the rate of return to education is low
A number of policies will foster human capital and promote economicgrowth, such assubsidizing education and increase enrollents, opening market and eliminating regional disparity in wages,equalizating regional and urban return by permitting free capital and labor mobility, centralizing educational finance
Even though these policies mentioned above don't reduce the inequality temporarily,in the long run,in a word, increase in human capital will reduce inequality and help the economic growth in china because it can helps enhance skills and equalize resourses

Yesterday was the twenty 3rd World AIDS Day
Started on 1st December 1988, World AIDS Day is about raising money, increasing awareness, fighting prejudice and improving education
World AIDS Day is important for reminding people that HIV has not gone away, and that there are many things still to be done
During 2009 some 2.6 million people became newly infected with the virus and an estimated 1.8 million people died from AIDS
But HIV today is a threat to men, women and children on all continents around the world

Culture smart or science intelligent
First ,let’s give a definition to both culture and science
Culture means the customs and beliefs, art,way of life and social organization of a particular country or group
While science means knowledge about the structure and behaviour at the natural and physical world, based on facts that you can prove, for example by experiments
Based on the definition we can say that culture is something abstract,the science is something specific
Beliefs , arts,customs are all a part of culture, it’s hard to tell what excatly they 
But science is quite different ,it is something made from the natural and physical world
We all can tell what it is and how does it made of
Culture is something connected with our inner heart , it is the creation of the human soul 
Sculpture,painting create the space; Something like music grasps the time
Due to psychological’s experiment and identification, inner world is related to the material world,, and the soul is the origin of the world
Can you imange a high developed material world without cultural civilization
In recent years ,dichlorvos ham,,melamine milk, fake diplomas,various of incidents occur frequently
What contributes to these, because of our underdevelopment of economy
Our carelessness towards fellow human results in it
Maybe someone will argue that we’re developing country, we have to do so for economic development
Bu let’s look at our neighbors india and vietnam, are they more developed than us, obviously it’s not
Indian pharmaceutical exports is among the world’s strongest and most powerful
We need more love, introspection and respection for others
But a world without culture is more terrible

Also, my essays often lack the relevancy between each paragraphs

Yesterday, I had a party with my neighbers
Three people are living in our apertment, and we sometimes have dinner together, or talk over a cup of coffee

We were not going to have the party, but we quickly decided to do because everyone were at home yesterday --which was rare --- and we were not sure when all the people can get together next time

I was able to get vegetables which are fresh, good quality, and cheap 
Daikon ( Chinese radish ) was 30 yen 
Strawberry was 100yen for 20 peices or so
pickled grean leaf vegetable was 50 yen 
Do you know \"Daikon Oroshi
It is greated radish
I ate Daikon Oroshi and pickled begetable with rice for lunch
They are so tasty 
I hope this marketing style ( local product for local people ) shold be more engouraged both fore consumers and farmers
Rakugo is Japanese sit down comedy
Rakugo tellers sit down on the stage and tell the audience funny story
Being different from a western-style comedian, a rakugo teller performs several kinds of role in the story
I want to try performing Rakugo in English, and tell people from overseas sense of Japanese humore  in the near future

The end of 2005, firstly I went to the Vietnam with my friends
During the 1 month, I studied Vietnamese at Vietnamese Language School in 
At that time, I've been interested about learning Vietnamese 
because I was majoring Vietnamese
Moreover, all of professors are kind and nice
During the weekend, I and my friends visited many famous places and ate Vietnam traditional food in Ho Chi Minh city
Vietnamese generally drives a motocycle
After we have seen numerous bikes in the road, when we crossed the street, feel scared
As days go by, we got used to walk the street, fortunately
I am very excited and outgoing in Vietnam
I even feel it's like my heaven
I made Vietnamses friends, they introdued famous restaurants and markets in the city
I had the opportunity to practice my Vietnamese to Vietnam People
After 1 month in Vietnam, We began with 1 month backpack trip
we went to the Ankor-Wat in Cambodia by bus except for main city of vietnam
Because length of Vietnam territory (from South to North)is 1,740km, we took the long time to move around there
But we experienced various culture of Vietnam
It's a real Vietnam
As a result,although Backpacking was pretty tough, It's really fun
Last Year, the end of the March, I went to the Hanoi in Vietnam again as a intern
I had a no problems to get used to Vietnam anymore
But I didn't use Vietnamese for a while, most of it I forgot
My office is located next to Daewoo Hanoi Hotel
It's little long distance by walk, from my home
Sadly, I was very busy when I stay in Hanoi, I can't have enough time to trip near city
But, I had a chance to go vacation during the national holidays of Vietnam
I remember it's a Anniversary of Vietnam War.)  
I like the bus trip
I'm very difficult to speak English comfortably
I continuosly think I don't give up about speaking English anymore

Fortunately, I just finished my task

I'm very scared the situation after my internship

Japanese at first, then translate it into English

Sometimes I am thinking about why american people often say  \"cool!\"or \"awesome\" for something unimportant things
Maybe it is just to express their surprise or impression in a exaggerate way
But I have never said such kind of exaggerate expression so often in Japanese before

「Ｒ」and 「L」Pronounciation
Yesterday I was talking with an american guy during the dinner about English
It is said that japanese pepple can't tell difference \"R\" and \"L\",because we don't have such pronouciation in Japanese
That's true,but although I've already known that how they pronouce \"L\"and \"R\",I couldn't tell the difference \"Work\" and \"Walk\" yesterday
It sounds almost same to me
In German it is totally different pronounciation,like \"arbeiten\"(work) and \"spazieren\"(walk) that's why sometimes German is easier for me than English
I think people who speasks English as a mother tongue,they use very often their toungue than Japanese,because I seldom use my toungue when I am speaking
I hear quite often that amereican people start their conversation with \"I mean..\" or \"To be honest..\" or \"like
I don't know why,so I asked him about this yeserday
It is one of the ways to start converstion
I suppose that it is like \"えっと～\"”っていうか～”　in Japanese
Reading English is also difficult,because I always translate it unconsciously from English to Japanese,otherwise I can't get the meaning sometime
For exsample, There is a lot of sentences which begin with \"that\" or \"which\" and they add the sentence
But When I have to translate it in Japanese,I always have to read after \"which\" or \"that sentence and go back to the first sentence
Maybe I have to take granted for that English and Japanese have a different construction
Nowadays I try to read English book without \"reconstract\" into Japanse,although I can't get it sometime
I hope someday I can read English book like English speaker is reading

Today I discussed about the difference between Japanese and English during the lecture
but not only English,but also other Language in general
I think that most difference between them is letters of course,but also pronunciation is the most different and it makes English very difficult for us
Because we can't pronounce English what we read
But you can pronounce Japanese what you read
Almost every one can understand what you say in Japanese,although you don't pronounce correctly or naturally
But when I pronounce English wrongly, nobody can understand what I say
What the difficult is only writting, I guess

I know that this notion is very controversial, but it's true as far as I know or experienced
And I don't think English is very bad choice, because there are lots of similar languages which are originally come from Latin
I don't know much about linguistic things, but what i want to say is that English has a lot of brother language like German or French.) and most of people (of course not everyone )have already had some English knowledge and the English grammar is not that difficult compared to another language
although it's very troublesome to learn an another language,but it's still very fun

When we would not have had a common language, it must have been impossible to communicate with them and spend at their house, because I can't speak either Arabic or French, while they can't speak Japanese

What I learned the most during this home stay, was how big and free America is ,and many a variety of people live together and how much life will be change,when I could speak \"English
That's why I changed my course,when I was a third-year student at highshcool
But as soon as I entered the University,my passion for English was gone,because there were a lot of japanese people in my department who speak English really good.(Most of them were returnee Child
I will not criticze or be envy of returnee Child,because they must have also had a lot of difficulty and it was not their choice to be born as returnee Child
As the time passed, I became to think that it is useless to learn English,because I thought that how hard I learn English,I can't be native speaker
That's why I really hate to speak English in Japan(especially in the class),because I didn't want to be thought that my english is bad and strange
But I realize later that my thought is falsh
I don't have to be \"native speaker\",because I can never be native english speaker,because I am Japanese
Since then I became to like English again and start learning English
Further more, I traveled recently in north Africa and there I got know a local people who spoke English without hesitating to speak,although he made a lot of mistakes
He works for hotel,and Every visiter understood what he said
It depend on what kind of situation you need to speak English
When you just want to enjoy conversation with people or just travel, you don't need high level of English
My goal is to be able to read book in English, get knowledge in English from the internet without using dictionary so often,talk and discuss the complicated issue with people in the world
I have no idea how many yeard it takes
Today I started to learn Spanish very spontaneously from one of my friend from Mexico
I just learn is as a fun,not seriously
Now I put the most emphasis on learning English and German,because English is of course important for my study and future job
German is just one of my favorite language.(A lot of people often say that German is not so beautiful language because of its strong and harsh sound, but I love this language because it sounds very cool and especially I love this Grammar because it is so good organized and logical
Before i started to learn German, I didn't think that people can learn more than 2 languages at the same time, but now I became to think that it's possible to learn some different languages at the same time,because I assume that there is lots of merit and multiplier effects
If you learn only one language and once get into problem over it, you don't feel like learning it anymore and probably stop learning it and have always an awareness that it will be hard to deal with
But if you learn also another language,it will be much better,because you can switch from it to that temporally and can have a short break until you become to learn it again

We put cooked vineger rice on a piece of seaweed, then put the materials you like on it and roll it up

Prepare a bawl of cooked rice and materials like salmon, 
handy-sized seaweed and put rice and your favorite materials on it 
and roll it up by oneself
preparation is very easy and everyone can enjoy making and eating

rice is taste at all

I live in Taiwan, located at the East-South of China
Taiwan is an island, surrounding beauty ocean
Of course many famous travel spots are related with ocean and beach
For example, Kenting(墾丁) is a famous traveling spot, not also foreign tourist like it, but also local residents love it very much
Kenting is a nature landscape, and you can see white sand, swimming people anywhere
Activities all you can think playing in the water can be found there, but some have to pay money
Here is really full of delicious food, but I don’t know whether it’s suit for foreigner
Mayday was formed from 1997 and still very popular in Taiwan
The members composed the team are a lead singer (Ashin), two guitarists (Monster and Stone), a bassist (Masa) and a drummer (Ming
Why am I attracted deeply by them
The answers are many reasons, including their songs and their spirits
Their songs are different with other band because it always touches me very much
The style of songs by they made are various and it reveals their strength and genius
The lyrics of the songs always are meaningful and reflect the thought of teenagers

My hometown is Kaohsiung, located in the south of Taiwan and it has one side facing to the ocean
Kaohsiung is the second big city of Taiwan, the first one is Taipei
Many years ago, Kaohsiung was an important harbor for trading and brought about its prosperity in the future
Besides, it played a significant role in the industry of Taiwan because there were some factories in the suburb
Furthermore, there is a national airport in Kaohsiung, so the transportation is convenient if you want to visit it
With the time going by, there are some changes in Kaohsiung
The local government did some effort to expand tourism and big constructions
For example, Mass Rapid Transit (MRT), shopping mall and an arena for World Games 2009
All residents were proud of the success to hold a glorious athletic evening
Besides, the one of most characterization is the enthusiasm of local residents, and we welcome any visitors to come here
In addition, there are many delicious foods, and you can find it in a night market
If you like nature landscape, you can go to coast in the sunset and look the sun hiding slowly under the ocean line

I don't know how situation looks in other countries but in Poland if you are retired and you don't have own savings your life may be difficult in the future
Of course it is not the rule because there are also people who have really high pension and they life very well
But young people like me should worry about theirs future
In my opinion the situation is going to be worst with every year
People life longer but they have less children than before
So the group of people who work is getting smaller than this who are retired
And that is one of the reason why pensions are getting lower in the future
So I decided a few years ago to learn how to invest my savings on the Warsow Stock Exchange (The Stock Exchange that function in Poland
Since that moment I have achieved some experience on how the market function
I have to admitt that I lost some of my money but I also earned it on the market
Now I am still not a milionar but in the future who konws

I you fear of losing your money or you prefer secure way of getting money you shouldn't try it

Probably this job is more stressful, but on the other hands it gives a lot of satisfaction
The salary in corporation is bigger and a carrer path is clearly explained
The main benefit of a job in a smaller company is that we grow up with the company
We have wider view on what the company really do
The best way is to start own business
Personally I am going to try in future every of this kind of job, starting form work for a corporation and finishing with my own business

Average length of the news is about 15-25 minutes
It's depend on a TV channel and a time of broadcasting
In Poland there are three main public channels and two commercial
Main public channels are called TVP1, TVP2, TVP INFO
The commercial one are called POLSAT and TVN
Each of the channel has the own news
First of all I have to say that no matter on the channel the news is very depressing
They are concentrated mostly on bad informations
It's probably because most people in Poland are pesimistic so they don't see positive thinks around them
In the news there are many informations about politics
It's the main part of the news, and this informations are also very negative because the news is mostly focused on showing how the main parties arguing about really unimportant subjects
I have a feeling that politicians in Poland after election completely forget about people and why and what for they were chosen
I noticed that at the end of the news they put some positive sometimes funny informations
In my opinion people should to avoid watching the TV news and try to look for information in independent sources like in the Internet
Television informations are in some way manipulated
I'm interested in how the news looks like in other countries
